40565181.review:
Статус: Пройдена.
Время прохождения: 3 ч.

Кажется только всё успокоилось, но внезапно вылетает ДеЛореан, из которого выходит… Марти из будущего и просит Дока пойти с ним, захватив Марти из настоящего, чтобы исправить будущее. В этот момент в небе появляется ещё один ДеЛореан. Синий. Из него выходит ещё один Марти и просит отправиться в его будущее. Наконец, появляется третий ДеЛореан, чёрный, третий Марти и тоже чем-то возмущается. Док и настоящий Марти в замешательстве. Они садятся в свой ДеЛореан и переносятся в будуще. В конце игры показывается пост "Продолжение следует" но уже как 7 лет как нету продолжения и это очень печально.

Оценка: 9/10

Piąty odcinek BttF: The Game lepszy niż trzeci i równie dobry co drugi i czwarty (szanuję za Dziki Zachód oraz postać Beauregarda Tannena z kreskówki). Absolutely brilliant. Not too complex like some point and clicks. It's quality over complexity, rather than making things complex to drag out the gameplay longer. The game is almost like watching a new back to the future movie.

It's nice to see there isn't flying cars in 2018, also good to see that there isnt sinclair C5's all over the place too, man that is a bad idea that luckly didnt catch on.  Hopefully this almanac will help with funding,  covering sports outcomes from 1980-2020. Now I must get back, as I am working on this concept of socialising over a large network of computers via cables all over the world.  People say i'm mad, but I think it might just catch on.

Yours truly

Bill Gates.

39049648.review:
Back to the Future: The Game is a fine addition to the classic Back to the Future story line. The story starts off fairly straight-forward, but then things get complicated as Marty and Doc go through the adventure. In true likeness to the original movies, nothing is ever simple when it comes to time travel, and simple events create great waves in the timeline.

The gameplay itself is that of a point-and-click adventure, with lots of talking to characters and using items to solve various situations. The puzzles are certainly not arbitrary like the past games, and most things can be figured out with a little bit of thought. But if you are ever stuck, there is an in-game hint system to help you move along and advance the story.

This title is certainly one that Back to the Future fans can appreciate. Even if you aren't a die-hard fan of the old films, there is still a fun story to be experienced here, and it may make a fan of you yet.

7/10 "Good"

39009956.review:
Since Steam splits every episode of Back to the Future into a separate store page, unlike newer Telltale games, I'm just putting my review for the entire game here.

A phenomenal adventure game that not only features great puzzles, but is driven by a funny, heatwarming story and incredible acting. It's the best sequel that Back to the Future has ever managed to produce, and made me genuinely care about the original movie even more.

38113119.review:
[b]TO RECENZJA CAŁEJ GRY, NIE POSZCZEGÓLNYCH EPIZODÓW
THIS IS A WHOLE GAME REVIEW, NOT THE SEPERATE EPIZODES[/b]

[b]PL[/b]
Świetna gra na podstawie filmu o tym samym tytule. Przygoda rozciąga się na 5 epizodów, po ok. 3h każdy.
Mamy tutaj wiele postaci z oryginalnego filmu, jak np Marty, Doc (Dr Brown), dziewczyna i rodzice głównego bohatera.
Większość akcji gry, jak również epizodów dzieje się w małym, choć dobrze odwzorowanym miasteczku z filmu.
Mamy liniową fabułę, jak również nagłe zwroty akcji, zagadki na koniec każdego epizodu, oraz zabawne teksty, gagi.
Grę cechuje poziom grafiki typowej dla gier spod znaku TellTaleGames, więc jest ona raczej kreskówkowa niż rzeczywista.
Myślę, że Back to the Future nadaje się dla każdego, nie ma w niej przemocy, wulgaryzmów, a jedynie dobra zabawa.

[b]EN[/b]
A great game based on a movie with the same title. The adventure extends to 5 episodes, with about 3 hours each.
Here we have many characters from the original movie, such as Marty, Doc (Dr Brown), a girlfriend and parents of the main character.
Most of the game's action, as well as episodes happen in a small, well-reproduced from a movie town, though.
We have a linear plot, as well as sudden twists, puzzles at the end of each episode, and joked texts, gags.
The game is characterized by the level of graphics typical for TellTaleGames games, so it's rather cartoonish than real.
I think that Back to the Future is good game for everyone, there is no violence, no vulgarisms, just the fun.

33917834.review:
This is one of the less memorable Telltale games for me, with The Walking Dead, Tales from the Borderlands, and Sam & Max being the ones the really stand out and I had a nice time with. I also remember Telltale's Jurassic Park game, but not for good reasons. In any case, I did like Telltale's Back to the Future game. It's not amazing, but it has some cute moments, a variety of time periods to keep things fresh enough, and some good voicework.

If the Back to the Future films aren't something you love, then the game might has less value for you, and even if you do love them, you can probably pass on this game unless it's really eating at you to play it, but they did a good job and I over all had a nice time here.

33804419.review:
[quote=]
 [h1] Назад в прошлое, что бы спасти будущее и нормализировать настоящее![/h1]

И наконец-то финал моего эпизодического обзора. Как ни прискорбно, но это и финальный эпизод игры. 

В Хилл-Вэлли началась выставка изобретений. Множество участников, экспонатов. Самые нереальные идеи, которые можно только себе представить. Модульные дома, подслушивающие устройства в виде горшков. Эх, для молодого пытливого ума тут прям рай земной. Марти и Эммет должны принять участие на этой выставке,  за одно разрушить планы свих противников, а в придачу спасти Хилл-Вэлли от полного стирания с временной линии с помощью бочки рассола и мешка песка. Последняя часть собрала в себя, наверное все временные линии которые только можно. И в конце приятным бонусом будет неожиданным  будут сведения о скрытой информации о семье МакФлаев.
Конечно же, некоторые вопросы после себя история оставляет, да и тут как нигде прежде чувствуется некоторые пробелы в истории и натянутость некоторых моментов. Но тем не менее эпизод получился очень увлекательным с довольно  медленным прологом и  очень динамичной концовкой.

33609440.review:
Ne connaissant Retour vers le Futur que de nom, ce jeu aura été une bonne surprise pour moi. Evidemment,je n'ai donc pas pu apprécier les eventuels clins d'oeil à la saga ce qui ne m'aura malgré tout pas empêché d'apprécier le jeu à sa juste valeur. En effet, doublage anglais irréprochable, graphismes très soignés, animations très bonnes, scénario accrocheur, mise en scène prenante, les ingrédients sont là pour passer une bonne dizaine d'heures de plaisir !

Quelques reproches que l'on pourrait faire au titre cependant : les sous-titres pas toujours appropriés, ce qui empêche parfois le bon fonctionnement de certains effets (notamment l'humour). Ensuite, le jeu ressemble, il est vrai, plus à un film interactif qu'à un jeu à proprement dit, surtout que les quelques fois où l'on participe un peu, les énigmes ne sont pas bien compliquées. Au final, on passe donc les 3/4 du temps à parler aux personnages, à suivre les nombreux dialogues et à visiter les décors. Ca m'aura au moins permis de me familiariser un peu avec l'univers, comme quoi ce n'est pas spécialement un point négatif.

En bref, tous les ingrédients sont au rendez-vous et tous les domaines sont très soignés ce qui nous permet de passer un vrai bon moment tout au long des cinq épisodes. je le conseille donc autant aux fans de la série qu'à ceux qui, comme moi, ne connaissent que les grandes lignes de la saga. D'ailleurs, mieux vaut tard que jamais, ça m'a bien donné envie de voir la version cinéma... >> 15/20

32935808.review: Epizodyczna gra przygodowa oparta na motywach kultowej trylogii Roberta Zemeckisa Powrót do Przyszłości. Za powstanie gry odpowiada specjalizujące się w tym gatunku gier amerykańskie studio Telltale Games, znane z takich produkcji, jak cykl Sam & Max czy kilka odsłon detektywistycznej serii CSI. W grze śledzimy perypetie znanych z ekranu bohaterów: nastolatka Marty'ego McFlya i szalonego naukowca Emmetta Browna, a akcja gry rozpoczyna się 6 miesięcy po wydarzeniach znanych z trzeciej części filmu. Rozgrywka polega na eksplorowaniu kolejnych lokacji, prowadzeniu konwersacji, rozwiązywaniu zagadek i zbieraniu potrzebnych przedmiotów, a całość podzielona została na kilka niezależnych epizodów, udostępnianych graczom w regularnych odstępach czasu. Oprawa graficzna Back to the Future utrzymana została w barwnym, kreskówkowym stylu, a w warstwie dźwiękowej słyszymy m.in. głos samego Christophera Lloyda, czyli odtwórcy roli szalonego doktora.

32466822.review:
Note: I'm writing the same review for all 5 episodes, since they're basically just one game cut into 5 separate titles, instead of one single package.

Back to the Future: The Game is a good Telltale Games point-and-click adventure, especially if you're a fan of the franchise. There's a lot of references to the movies and in reality the whole game feels like another movie, which is good here. The story is good and well written, and the characters interesting with superb voice acting. There's a lot of comedy too. The puzzles are OK, not being too difficult. There's a great hint system if you need it, so you're never stuck for long. Since it's an older game, there's aren't choices to make here, but that wasn't a deal breaker, especially if you get it for cheap. The controls are a bit clunky though, and the framerate choppy.

32195193.review: Какой нехороший человек придумал вместо одной полноценной игры сделать 5 но мелконарезаных? Ужасно неудобно!

32011920.review: Great ending to a great game...

31930570.review:
NOTA: Este análisis es de todos los episodios en conjunto, y lo copiaré y pegaré en cada uno de ellos.

Por ser una de las primeras aventuras gráficas de Telltale, digamos, de primer nivel, presenta una diferencia fundamental con las aventuras mas modernas de esta desarrolladora, como The Walking Dead, Game of Thrones o Batman: NO HAY DECISIONES QUE ALTEREN LA HISTORIA,  el juego es totalmente lineal y solo hay una posible solución y desenlace de la historia. Esto no es necesariamente malo, simplemente distinto, si vas a jugarlo esperando otra cosa, probablemente te lleves una decepcion.

Dicho esto, el apartado gráfico del juego es Telltale 100%, graficos de estilo "dibujos animados", aunque con mucho menos Cel Shading (efecto comic, para que nos entendamos) que otros titulos. Para una aventura gráfica cumple sobradamente, pero sin duda los puntos fuertes del juego son la historia y la banda sonora, ambas, obviamente heredadas de la trilogía cinematográfica. Si eres un fan de la saga, como yo, disfrutaras la historia, si solo eres un fan de las historias de viajes en el tiempo, también, y si no eres ni de una ni de otra, también, aunque es altamente recomendable ver las peliculas, sobre todo para el principio, ya que, si no, nos descolocará ver la situacion de los personajes, y durante el juego, no entenderemos muchas referencias. Además, el juego tiene MUCHO fan service en este aspecto, con frases, expresiones, citas y referencias a las pelis y es una pena no cogerlas. Personalmente me da algo de rabia que justo en los ultimos compases del juego empiezan a aparecer "incongurencias" en la linea temporal, pero es algo que suele pasar cuando haces historias sobre vijes en el tiempo y paradojas temporales, que hacer que todo quede resuelto y explicado es algo complejo.

La jugabilidad no tiene mucho misterio, decir que es point & click, aunque se puede mover al personaje con WASD y que tiene puzzles interesantes, pero no esperes un Monkey Island o un Randal's Monday en dificultad. Esto es una aventura de Telltale y basicamente te cuenta una historia, no busca hacerte la vida imposible.

Como detalle final, que es algo muy comentado: El final. Es un final de fan service 200%, mal llevado, que hace más daño que otra cosa, pero no estropea el resto del juego. Son solo los ultimos 2 minutos.

Su mayor handicap es sin duda que solo está en ingles, lo que hara que muchos no puedan jugarlo, pero a parte de eso es un buen juego, sobre todo si eres fan.

NOTA FINAL: 7.5

31709586.review: Ce ending! Se potrivește perfect cu c.um aș vedea eu un al patrulea film Back to the Future. Am râs atât de mult în acest al patrulea episod! Tot ce pot spune este că acest joc a fost o experiență super. Povestea a fost foarte bine pusă la punct, character developmentul de asemenea, iar gameplay-ul este exact c.um ar trebui un joc adventure să fie: plin de puzzle-uri.

31533703.review:
So to be completely fair, I did not completely hate the Back to the Future Telltale series, but by the end of it I came to understand how very uneven the whole affair felt. Each episode takes you to a different time period, but they don't have much of a rhythm. You are in one time a LOT and then in other times a very short period. I found most of the puzzles tolerable, but nothing that really grabbed me.

To be fair this is my first completion of a Telltale series game, so I'm not entirely sure the style of game is up my alley at all, but by the end of BTTF I was 2 hours in to wanting to be finished.

Technically I also had problems with the Marty Doc dynamic in this particular episode and felt it completely missed the mark. Characters suddenly change their entire personality and then flip-flop their positions... I don't know. It rubbed me the wrong way. 

So if a friend asked if they should play this or something else, I would have a tendency to say "maybe something else."

31530038.review: A well made point & click game

31433469.review: Wer Back to the future mag wird hier gut bedient.

31375349.review:
Quinto y ultimo episodio del del videojuego de Telltale Games de Regreso Al Futuro. En este ultimo episodio de la aventura,tendremos mas momentos de  acción y humor como en los episodios 1,2 y 4. El final me ha gustado mucho,muy épico y gracioso.
Guion,jugabilidad y sonido buenos. La duracion que me ha llevado completar este capitulo ha sido aproximadamente de 2h y 15 mins.
Como curiosidades de este episodio final decir que:

-El señor Michael J. Fox pone su voz a varios personajes que salen en el juego.En plan homenaje-cameo a las películas de Regreso Al Futuro

-Al final del episodio suena la canción Back in Time interpretada por Huey Lewis & The News.Otro guiño a la saga cinematográfica de BTF.

-Al final de los créditos se ve un críptico To be continued?...Como los señores Robert Zemeckis y Bob Gale nos tenian acostumbrados en la trilogía de BTF.

Recomendable jugar a estos 5 episodios de BTF The Game,lo malo que no esta traducido al castellano,pero en internet puedes encontrar traducciones al español y disfrutar del juego en castellano.O si dominas el idioma de shakespeare lo disfrutaras también y no tendrás problema.

31258823.review:
[h1] DISCLAIMER: This is a full review, and NOT a first impressions review 

ANOTHER DISCLAIMER: Back to the Future: The Game has five episodes which are split seperately and are downloaded one by one, thus reviews are more or less the same as the gameplay mechanics are basically the same in all five episodes. So please think before commenting about the similarity in the reviews [/h1]

Back to the Future: The Game is an episodic adventure game with five episodes, developed and published by Telltale Games, the same people behind other such great adventure games as The Wolf Among Us and Game of Thrones. The game is based on the film series of the same name

Although the game does not follow the same exact storyline as the first film, it follows the same universe as Back to the Future follows only seeing it in a different point of view

As mentioned previously, the game is split up into five episodes. The game works as a normal television series. Each length of an episode is roughly one hour long

The gameplay is very simple, you move around, selecting stuff and talking to people and using button prompts when told to. Choices don't really matter as to other Telltale Games

The game's graphics are okay for the most part however there are some ugly texture work here and there. The sound and music options also vary in quality. Sometimes the sound quality is really good and sometimes the sound quality is bad. I have encountered numerous amounts of glitches which seems as if Telltale Games never got round to fixing them, too many to mention in this review

Telltale's Back to the Future: The Game pays a good homage to the Back to the Future film series and is definitely better than Jurassic Park: The Game which is another Universal Pictures license

[h1] RECOMMENDED :) [/h1]

31204483.review: Enjoyed playing through all episodes. A well-penned story, compelling characters, and a stellar presentation drive this Telltale series more than anything else. Great voiceacting by the original cast including a cameo of Michael J. Fox.

31090329.review: no i ostatni 5 odcinek, bardzo wazny po 1, 2, 3 i 4 czesci :) zeby wszystko bylo spojne

31087510.review:
This isn't so much an adventure game as an interactive story, but it's a good bit of fun and easy to enjoy. 

The puzzle solutions are sometimes quite unobvious, leaving you hovering the mouse over every conceivable object on the screen or simply using the hint system. That's not to say that this game is challenging by any means, on the whole it's fairly easy to breeze through each episode in one or maybe two sittings.

Fans of Back to the Future will love it. Fans of adventure games, you may want something a bit more challenging. Still a great purchase though, and easily a steam sale must-have.

31027250.review: I highly recommend the entire Back to the Future Series for any fan of story/aventure PC games, Telltale in general, and BTTF fans, of course.  The final episode warranted a special addendum as it felt like too much was crammed into concluding the series - there was much more dialogue and less gameplay.  Speaking of conclusion, there really wasn't one ultimately unless the intention was to tell folks not to mess with the timeline.  That could have very well been the case, but I was hoping for something more resolute after 10-15 hours.  Gametime was about 10 hours, but you could play 15 hours if you click on everything and investigate every piece of dialogue.  Although the ending wasn't all that satisfying for me, it still a great game that I would absolutely recommend.

30987775.review: Solo per amanti dell'omonima trilogia cinematografica.

30838972.review: Hill Walley- город будущего, где нет преступности, коррупции, смерти. Все люди красиво одеты и очень вежливы. На верное поэтому Марти и профессор- наши главные герои одеты, что надо, слегка старомодно, но это только придаёт им шика. Марти при гастуке и в жилетке от костюма- тройки, а чёкнутый профессор выглядит как дворецкий, однако это не мешает ему доминировать над Марти на правах старшего ( в смысле возраста). Марти катается на скейте, а не на гравитационной доске, а профессор управляет машиной времени.

30487779.review: OUTATIME corrects many of the past four episodes' weaknesses with plentiful locations, a strong script, and a fulfilling conclusion to what has been an upsettingly lackluster series.

30455745.review: A very weird cconclusion to a great story, but the movies were always weird too. I'd recommend it, but the only bad thing I have to say is how sad it is that Telltale won't do a Season 2.

30355083.review: Best game ever, all episodes are great

30223762.review:
Почему стоит играть:
+ Новые приключения любимых героев.
+ Дока озвучивает всё тот же великолепный Кристофер Ллойд. А голос Марти хоть и не Майкл Дж. Фокса, но очень на него похож, потому воспринимается как родной. Озвучка других героев так же не подкачала.
+ Добротные головоломки.

Почему не стоит играть:
- Полностью провальная история. Элемент, который был просто великолепным в фильме, и который крайне важен в играх подобного жанра, получился крайне посредственным. Сюжетные дыры образуются на каждом сюжетном повороте. Авторы вообще забыли про хоть какую-то логику и идеи из фильма. В результате из научной фантастики история скатилась до бабушкиной сказки. Чего только стоит объяснение возвращения делориана.
- Однообразие. Почти всё действие в игре происходит между 1986 и 1931 годах на одной и той же локации с небольшими ответвлениями. Хоть что-то интересное начинает происходить только в третьем эпизоде, но потом опять скатывается на унылый 31-ый год.
- Абсолютно неуместное камео Майкл Дж. Фокса в пятом эпизоде. Оно вызывает не радость, а недоразумение и вопрос "Что это было?". Настолько нелепо вписать персонажа нужно ещё постараться.

Игра паразитирует на ностальгии. Не будь за её плечами великолепных трёх частей фильма, она прошла бы незаметной. Как самостоятельное произведение она никчёмна. Но как творение, расширяющее полюбившуюся вселенную и дарящую новую встречу с Марти и Доком, очень даже хорошо. В неё стоит поиграть хотя бы ради третьего эпизода.

29716694.review:
For fans of the movies, there really isn't much of a choice other than to play this series. "Back to the Future: The Game" is one of TellTale's earlier games, and it shows, with very limited choices and a linear story. The story itself also hews close to the original trilogy, down to the same feel when it comes to the final resolution.

Voice acting isn't bad. Christopher Lloyd is around to voice Doc Brown, and Michael J. Fox makes a cameo near the end. They got other voice actors to play everyone else (including Marty McFly and the various Biffs), but they do a decent job. The music is great, right out of the movies. To be honest, if you go into this game expecting to be playing the movie (or an episode of the animated series), you'll know what you're in for.

I really enjoyed this series back when it first came out, but it isn't as good as TellTale's later attempts.

29657272.review: Decent ending but I was expecting the timestream to rip apart ala Life is Strange.

29264153.review: As a HUGE BTTF fan, I'm shocked and dismayed it took me until now to finally get around to playing this series.  Having played the more recent Telltale offerings, the return to the more old-school adventure style mechanics took me a bit of getting used to but once I got rolling I was thoroughly engrossed with these episodes.  As is the norm, a couple of the puzzles were a touch obscure and there were a few spots where what to do wasn't immediately obvious, but these are minor quibbles.  The music and voice acting are excellent across the board and Christopher Lloyd does an amazing job as Doc Brown as usual.  Absolutely recommended if you're a fan of the movies and/or Telltale adventures!

Każdy epizod starcza na 2-2,5 h, a jest ich 5 więc całość zajmie ponad 10h. Polecam wszystkim :) Nie przepadam za grami Telltale, a tę polecam.

28349039.review:
[h1]Short version: 90%[/h1]
The last part of TellTale’s Back to the Future series feels a bit rushed, as it has to race through not two, but three large events. This faster pace also means a lot tighter gameplay and less videogame-like puzzles, resulting in a spectacular cinematic finale.

[h1]Long version:[/h1]
While this is probably the best episode in this point ‘n’ click series, ‘OUTATIME’ actually starts out pretty slow—especially considering how big of a fuss the story made of the science fair Marty attends in the first half. But after going through some of the usual TellTale hoops/subtasks, the story switches gear and suddenly drops probably the biggest and most catastrophic timeline-change thus far.

At that point, many players may wonder how can something of that magnitude be resolved in roughly two-thirds of an episode, and the answer is surprisingly low-key, as the solution to change back history and Hill Valley the way it used to be is tied to talking, and exploring the mindset and experiences of a certain supporting character.
Those who like this franchise for its adventurous tone won’t be left in the dust either, since action follows the long-winded talk, as we visit yet another time, only to end the series in the most typical TellTale manner: an action-y puzzle, where Marty singlehandedly has to save his friends from a gang of rather unpleasantly-looking Tannens.

The reward? A (mostly) fixed timeline, a cameo by Michael J. Fox, and something we may consider as a promise for a second season… which will never be made, as TellTale now focuses on interactive television series based on much newer and more mainstream franchises. Still, Back to the Future was at least a fitting and great swansong of their old adventure game style.

28315314.review:
ATTENZIONE:il gioco l'ho comprato compreso di 5 episodi in un unico pacchetto.questa recensione,nonostante noterete sia fatta sull'episodio 5,SARà UNA RECENSIONE BASATA SU TUTTI E 5 GLI EPISODI

iniziamo la recensione:

prima di "the walking dead",prima di "the wolf among us",il capolavoro della telltale games basato sulla trilogia dei film di "ritorno al futuro".la storia è ambientata dopo le vicende del terzo film.diviso in 5 episodi (che,stranamente,ho dovuto installarli singolarmente),vedremo ancora all'azione Doc e Marty viaggiare nel tempo.a differenza di TWD e TWAU,questa storia non cambia in base alle scelte prese e le stesse scelte non prevedono un tempo limitato per essere selezionate (quindi potete pensarci bene a quello che potete scegliere).la grafica è carina (anche se potevano farla leggermente meglio),come audio è presente la stessa colonna sonora strumentale di Alan Silvestri (mi sarei aspettato anche "the power of love" di Huey Lewis and the News,che,stranamente,è assente).mancanza di archivi e carte collezionabili,a parte ciò il divertimento è assicurato.consigliato

vi metto il link dove poter trovare i sottotitoli
http://gamesresources.forumfree.it/?t=62265679
dovete solo estrarre il file 0.ttarch nella cartella PACK dentro la cartella di gioco
fate così per tutti e 5 gli episodi,aggiungo anche che avete anche un file (che ho preferito estrarre) per l'episodio 5 (solo l'episodio 5) chiamato 0_6.patch.ttarch da mettere sempre nella cartella PACK

buon divertimento e ricordate "Il vostro futuro non è scritto,il futuro di nessuno è scritto,il futuro è come ve lo creerete voi perciò createvelo buono!"

26004385.review: Absolutely wonderful. If you're a fan of Back to the Future this is an amazing add on. Almost like 4th movie in itself. The fact that they got Cristopher Lloyd as Doc and had Bob Gale working on it makes me consider this canon. Michael J Fox's cameo is spot on.

25890996.review:
Собственно, хочу сказать одно - атмосфера.
Игра, как её не крути, цепляет.

Если Вы фанат "Назад в будущее", то скорее всего Вы не останетесь разочарованным.

Плюсы.
Продолжение истории Мартина и Дока.
Атмосфера и отсылки к фильмам.
Сюжет сам по себе захватывает и в некоторых местах заставлять сочувствовать героям.

Минусы.
Графика. Да, она самая. Лично для меня она не имеет значения, мне понравилась. Однако, учитывая то, что сейчас каждый 2-й зациклен на "современных стандартах качества текущего года" то она выглядит так себе.
Увы, но нет русских субтитров. Поэтому ищите их сами.
Простота загадок. Хотя, если расценивать эту игру как интерактивный фильм - то этот минус превращается в плюс.
Ну и пожалуй самый главный минус - это то, что она разбита на серии, которые так и не собрали в одну целую игру.

В целом, эта игра достойна внимания, как со стороны фанатов так и со стороны тех, кто просто хочет провести часок-другой за приятной игрой, наслаждаясь сюжетом и не особо заморачиваясь над тем как сделать то или это, дабы продвинутся дальше.

Спасибо за внимание!

P.S.
Хотелось бы однажды увидеть продолжение этой истории)

25216318.review:
*Ich beziehe mich im folgenden auf die gesamte Staffel des Spiels und nicht gesondert auf die fünfte Episode. Meine Eindrücke gelten für alle Folgen, keine hat sich hierbei sichtlich nach unten oder oben von den anderen abgesetzt.*



Tolle Hommage an die Filme, die Geschichte ist das Highlight und sehr spannend erzählt, manchmal wird das spielerische dazwischen (Hole dies dort und bringe es da hin) etwas mehr zur Arbeit als ich mir das gewünscht hätte.

Die gut erzählte Geschichte (mit den üblichen Cliffhangern) wird durch eine tolle Synchro (sowohl Englisch als auch Deutsch sind gut gemacht) und hervorragenden Musikeinsatz getragen.
Grafisch wird mit der altbekannten Telltale Engine gearbeitet, der Stil ist leicht comichaft, aber sauber und schön ansehbar, die Animationen wirken ziemlich altbacken. Technisch machen sich die üblichen Telltale-Games-Probleme bemerkbar, Bildstottern und Ruckeln, manche Tonaussetzer. Das alles tritt aber völlig im Rahmen auf und hindert nicht daran, das Gesamtspiel genießen zu können. Spieldauer ist mit ca. 9 Stunden für die Gesamte Staffel völlig in Ordnung, die letzten zweieinhalb Episoden habe ich am Stück gespielt, das spricht für das Spiel!

Klare Empfehlung, insbesondere wegen der Geschichte, die durchaus mit den Filmen mithalten kann. Auch wenn es schon ein wenig älter ist, bereits hier zeigen Telltale ihre absoluten Stärken, eine spannende und logische (dafür ein zusätzliches Hut ab, immerhin ist das Hauptthema Zeitreisen!) Geschichte zu erzählen.

25205078.review: Ótimo jogo! Bem estilo dos RPGs tipo day of the tentacle e Sam e Max. Humor e clima da série. Nota 10!! Acabei todos os 5 rs

24739920.review:
[h1]Was travelling through time:[b]Wing[/b][/h1]
One basic thing, I've never watched a [i]Back to the Future[/i] movie, so I can only think that game is based on a film.
[i]Back to the Future[/i] is point-&-click game made by [u]Telltale Games[/u], as we all know, it must be episodic, game itself has 5 episodes that were released from [b]22 December 2010 to 23 June 2011[/b]. Game action takes place in fictional city [i]Hill Valley[/i]. Here's the list of episodes and short description of what is going in them([u]I will try to include as little amount of spoilers as I can[/u])[olist]
[*][b]It's About Time[/b] - We begin game in 1986, but when we find out our best friend is missing, we are looking for him, after that, we are going back in time to 1931 to rescue our friend! 
[*][b]Get Tannen![/b] - When everything seems ok, our friend finds out that our grandfather is going to die and we need to rescue him AND make the most dangerous criminal in Hill Valley, will go to jail!
[*][b]Citizen Brown[/b] - Everything looks fixed, everyone is happy (except that one guy in jail), but then! We are transported to [i]Future Hill Valley[/i] or [i]Pure Hill Valley[/i] or, as I prefer to say [i]Alternate Hill Valley[/i]. In this episode we need to make problems in [i]Pure Hill Valley[/i] to meet [u]Citizen Brown[/u] and convince that HIS [i]Hill Valley[/i] is bad and people are unhappy!
[*][b]Double Visions[/b] - After rescuing [u]Citizen Brown[/u] and destroying his ideal vision of sad [i]Hill Valley[/i] we need to rescue him again from his enraged wife, then go back in time to 1931 to find his younger self and convince him to break up with his future wife, after that is done, episode ends.
[*][b]OUTATIME![/b] - We are still in 1931 and we must find Younger Brown [spoiler]his older self kidnapped him[/spoiler] and then we must take care that Younger one, will do his presentation at Science Expo. After that, everything seems ok, but then! The Woman who broke with Brown, stole his DeLorean and went back in time, and we need to find out to what date she travelled, after that, we are going to 19th Century to stop arson of the Saloon and in consequence, destruction of whole[i]Hill Valley[/i]. In the end, we must manipulate with stolen DeLorean and then make sure that she'll land in 1931... And in the end is kinda funny plot twist but discover it by yourself :)[/olist]
And now's time for few most important characters:[list]
[*][i]Marty McFly[/i] - Main protagonist, time traveler, also known as [i]Sonny Crockett, Yakov Smirnoff[/i]
[*][i]Emmett 'Doc' Brown [/i] - Best friend of Marty, time traveler, inventor, also known as [i]Carl Sagan - The Infamous Arsonist[/i]
[*][i]Edna Strickland[/i] - And here are 2:
 - [i]Young Edna[/i] - Cute, manipulating, desiring power and control over people [spoiler]She's the real arsonist[/spoiler]
 - [i]Old Edna[/i] - Alone, miserable, spends days on yelling
[*][i]Biff Tannen[/i] - Typical bully, in the right timeline he works for Marty's father.
[*][i]Arthur McFly[/i] - Only seen in 1931, our Grandfather, he makes kinda big role in Marty adventure
[*][i]Kid Tannen[/i] - The most dangerous gangster in 1931, he needs to be arrested (Episode 2)
[*][i]Einstein[/i] - Our cute and lovely dog <3 
[*][i]Citizen Brown also known as Alternate Emmett[/i] - He thinks that HIS [i]Hill Valley[/i] is perfect, we need to convince him that this city is Town of fear
[*][i]Citizen Edna also known as Alternate Old Edna[/i] - Manipulates with [i]Alternate Emmett[/i], after Marty destroys her husband's vision of perfect city, she tries to manipulate with his memory
[*][i]Young Emmett[/i] - Young inventor, feared of his dad, in sick love with Edna
[*][i]Trixie Trotter also known as 'Sylvia'[/i] - Our (unknowingly until end of game) Grandmother, speakeasy stage performer, cute[/list]
Let's see how it looks...
[b]Gameplay - 8/10[/b] - Typical point-&-click, with annoying camera sometimes, yet still, gameplay is great
[b]Audio - 6/10[/b] - Not bad, not good, decent, BUT with soundtrack from movie I think
[b]Graphics - 8/10[/b] - Nice, clear, not-eye hurting, except characters sometimes look like dead (I mean, without emotions)
[b]Story - 10/10[/b] - Great! Just Great!

[h1]OVERALL - 8/10[/h1] - [i]Game itself has a few bugs here and there, and sometimes can be harder or easier, but this is one, great, funny story with lovely characters and with unfortunately decent audio, I can recommend it for fans of point-&-click or Telltale Games lovers[/i]

[u][b]Greetings, Wing[/b][/u]

24640758.review:
Although the story was creative and within the realm of the franchise, the story's conclusion left me wishing that something more was accomplished by the actions taken in the 5 episode arc. For instance, at the end of the BTTF 3 movie Doc gets a wife and a few kids. Nowhere near that is accomplished by the game's conclusion.  I did enjoy the Michael J Fox guest appearance, but the lacking conclusion to the story means I can't bring myself to give this last episode a thumbs up.

[b]I only recommend the overall game on sale to fans of the BTTF movies[/b]. It is a a bare bones point & click linear adventure game with many mildly infuriating components, but the story is a fairly faithful 5 episode sequel to the BTTF movies. You play as Marty McFly in 1985 which starts with an homage to the first movie, but takes place after the 3 movies.

24552042.review:
Прекрасная игра из тех времён, когда Telltale ещё не скатилась и делала прекрасные адвенчуры. "Назад в Будущее" сочетает в себе приятную графику, зрелищные и интересные катсцены и кинцо, но в тоже время в игре осталось место квесту, задачкам и интересным головоломкам. Это настоящая современная адвенчура такая, какая она могла бы быть в наше время. Да ещё и по любимым фильмам)

Последний финальный эпизод чем-то напоминает последний третий фильм - тот же дикий запад, та же атмосфера небольшой грусти, потому что всё заканчивается. Спасибо, Марти и Док!) Было круто)

24511302.review: The writing once again was done very well.  A few heartwarming moments were pulled off surprisingly well.  Most of the puzzles were pretty easy, but I won't complain too much about that.  The one thing I did not expect was the ending.  There a few surprises along with something else I did not expect.  I won't spoil it here, but I will say that it was a pretty good ride for a fan of the franchise.  I hope TellTale decides to make another season.  Only the future will tell.

24484976.review:
[h1] ⚜ Zusammenfassung: [/h1]

In dieser Episode bricht das Chaos nun endgültig aus. Edna hat sich des DeLorios bemächtigt und in der Vergangenheit eine neue Gegenwart erschaffen, nur mit ihrer Hilfe können wir rekonstruieren was in der Vergangenheit der Vergangenheit passiert ist und somit vielleicht einen Weg in Martys Gegenwart finden. 


[+]
● eine Geschichte die zwar auf 'Back to the Future' beruht jedoch keine nach Erzählung darstellt
● schöne Vertonung/Synchronisation
● wie immer packender Erzählstil der Telltale - Games
● es gibt Tipps zur Hilfestellung
● witzige Dialoge

[-]
● ältere Grafik


[h1] ⚜ Fazit: [/h1]

Insgesamt eine gelunge Reihe von 'Back to the Future'  die besonders in der fünften Episode aufklärt aber auch neue wirre Situationen zurück lässt. Was lernt man wenn man mit der Zeit spielt? Es gibt keine Situation, die sich nicht wieder beheben lässt. Übrigens ähnelt 'Back to the Future' ein wenig dem Prinzip von 'Doctor Who'. Erstauflage der Serie erschien 1963 - 'Back to the Future' kam etwas später 1985 heraus. Ich bin jedenfalls Fan beider Geschichten.

24483505.review: i should stop fucking with time now.....

24389005.review:
스토리는 좋은 게임입니다, 영화 백투더퓨처3 이후의 얘기를 다루고 있습니다

하지만 워킹데드 전에 나온 게임이라 그런지 게임성과 인터페이스는 정말 최악입니다

그러므로 정말 스토리를 즐겨보겠다는 생각이 아니면 비추합니다

24273401.review: Back to the Future: The Game - игра сиквел по мотивам трилогии Роберта Земекиса "Back to the Future". Достойное продолжение истории доктора Эмметта Брауна и его спутника Марти Макфлая. Игра полна отсылками к оригинальной трилогии и пропитана той самой атмосферой прошлого, настоящего и будущего. Огромное спасибо разработчикам из Telltale Games за великолепный сюжет и полученное удовольствие при прохождении игры.

24001983.review: Nice comme jeu même si graphiquement il n'est pas au niveau des jeux actuels, il ne faut jamais se fier au apparence car scénaristiquement, je trouve le jeu extraordinaire ! Je demande une suite à jeu :p
